channel.title: Comments on: Gluten Free Carrot, Zucchini and Apple Cake

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: Moist fruity cakes often work well with gluten free flour. I like the way you've added a bit of everything - apple, zucchini and carrot.
item.content:encoded: Moist fruity cakes often work well with gluten free flour. I like the way you’ve added a bit of everything – apple, zucchini and carrot.

item.title: By: Isabella
item.dc:creator: Isabella
item.description: This cake looks absolutely lovely, so moist and delicious looking!! I would love to try the Chocolate Ripple Mix as I know a number of people who can only eat gluten free products and this seems an easy way to make a treat for them!!
item.content:encoded:
This cake looks absolutely lovely, so moist and delicious looking!!
I would love to try the Chocolate Ripple Mix as I know a number of people who can only eat gluten free products and this seems an easy way to make a treat for them!!

item.title: By: Brittany
item.dc:creator: Brittany
item.description: Yum! This looks like a yummy combination. Carrot cake is my favourite, and I've never tried zucchini cake/loaf but I hear it's great -- so thanks for the recipe :)
item.content:encoded: Yum! This looks like a yummy combination. Carrot cake is my favourite, and I’ve never tried zucchini cake/loaf but I hear it’s great — so thanks for the recipe ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Amber
item.dc:creator: Amber
item.description: Such a gorgeous and original combination! Agreed with the texture of gluten-free flour. I bake a lot of gluten free recipes having two co-workers who are intolerant. I think I may give this a try for our next office birthday :)
item.content:encoded: Such a gorgeous and original combination! Agreed with the texture of gluten-free flour. I bake a lot of gluten free recipes having two co-workers who are intolerant. I think I may give this a try for our next office birthday ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: sweetlife
item.dc:creator: sweetlife
item.description:
carrot, zuchinni and apple wow what a combo, I love spices also..
sweetlife
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: I've made lots of zucchini and carrot cakes, but never one gluten free! This looks so moist too! Great work, Anita! Makes me want to try this flour!
item.content:encoded: I’ve made lots of zucchini and carrot cakes, but never one gluten free! This looks so moist too! Great work, Anita! Makes me want to try this flour!

item.dc:creator: mademoiselle dÃ©licieuse
item.description: How did you find the texture of the gluten-free flour? Oh is it hard to notice the difference with all grated fruit and veg offering moistness?
item.content:encoded: How did you find the texture of the gluten-free flour? Oh is it hard to notice the difference with all grated fruit and veg offering moistness?

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: That looks great Anita! I got slightly different ingredients so it will be interesting to see how it all works! :D
item.content:encoded: That looks great Anita! I got slightly different ingredients so it will be interesting to see how it all works! ðŸ˜€

item.title: By: Betty @ The Hungry Girl
item.dc:creator: Betty @ The Hungry Girl
item.description: I've never tried the zucchini & choc combination either! This looks so lovely and moist :)
item.content:encoded: I’ve never tried the zucchini & choc combination either! This looks so lovely and moist ðŸ™‚
